items.name: Simple Axe
items.description: Typically used for cutting wood, makes an adequate weapon.

items.name: Simple Staff
items.description: Said to contain the soul of a web developer.

items.name: Simple Sword
items.description: Enemies who are hit with this sword tend to take damage.

items.name: Simple Bow
items.description: If you want to hurt someone but they are over there and you are over here, you may consider a bow.

items.name: Simple Knife
items.description: Not suitable for use in gun fights.

items.name: Mushroom
items.description:
Seems like a fun guy.

Heals you a bit if you eat it.

items.name: Wooden Shield
items.description: Lighter than an iron shield, which makes it easier to hold, but less effective as a shield.

items.name: Iron Shield
items.description: Heavier than a wooden shield, which makes it more effective as a shield, but harder to hold.

items.name: Cool Hat
items.description: This hat makes its wearer look cool, which makes the hat itself inherently cool.

items.name: Iron Helmet
items.description: Your head is where your brain is, so it's worth looking after.

items.name: Wizard Hat
items.description: No one really understands why pointy hats make magic attacks more powerful, but to be honest no one really understands magic.

items.name: Ruby Bracelet
items.description: It does not serve a practical purpose, but it is shiny and a nice red colour so it is universally coveted.

items.name: Clothes
items.description: For if you are cold or you have personal reservations about being naked.

items.name: Leather Armour
items.description: Can protect you from some damage without impeding your movement or harming your punk aesthetic.

items.name: Iron Armour
items.description: The manufacturer does not recommend this armour for underwater adventures or stealth missions.

items.name: Fancy Cloak
items.description: It makes a very dramatic 'swish' noise when you walk away from someone.

items.name: Leather Boots
items.description: If cowboys existed in this game, these boots would make you look like one, and you would look good because cowboys would look good in this game.

items.name: Iron Boots
items.description: They make a sound as you walk that sounds sort of like 'CLUNK CLUNK CLUNK'

items.name: Gloves
items.description: They don't offer a lot of protection, but they keep your hands nice and warm

items.name: Iron Gauntlets
items.description: Big and heavy and made of metal, they keep your fingers protected against many finger level threats.

items.name: Emerald Ring
items.description: You can tell it's an emerald because it is a green jewel in a video game.

items.name: Cute Ribbon
items.description: Ribbons are used by humans as an accessory to subtly improve their overall aesthetic.

items.name: Cloak
items.description: Not quite as fancy as a Fancy Cloak, but it can be used to cloak you nonetheless.

items.name: Diamond Jewel
items.description: Worth a lot of money to those who believe that diamonds are worth a lot of money.

items.name: Onyx Jewel
items.description: Evolves into a Steelyx Jewel if traded with a metal coat.

items.name: Fake Diamond Jewel
items.description: Perfect for someone wishing to appear wealthy without the hassle of amassing wealth.

items.name: Ruby Jewel
items.description: I guess you could make a Ruby Bracelet with it if this were one of those games where you could do that.

items.name: Sapphire Jewel
items.description: It is shiny and blue like a packet of crisps, but slightly more valuable.

items.name: Emerald Jewel
items.description: One of several jewels in this game. I had to write a descrption for all of them and ran out of ideas by this one.

items.name: Health Potion
items.description: A random bottle of liquid you found on the ground, apparently drinking it will heal you.

items.name: Weak Poison
items.description: We gave you the option to drink this, but we generally advise against it.

items.name: Strong Poison
items.description: It will kill you, do not drink it.

items.name: Four Leaved Clover
items.description: Maybe having this item in your inventory improves your chances of favourable outcomes, and maybe it does not.

items.name: Magic Lamp
items.description: There is a genie trapped inside who would grant you three wishes if you rubbed this lamp, but your player character doesn't know that so will never feel inclined to do so.

items.name: Love Potion
items.description: It makes the person who drinks it fall in love with a man named Colin who works at the love potion factory, who put his DNA into this batch as a prank. Drinking is ill-advised.

items.name: New Book
items.description: 'A Comprehensive Guide to Jewelry Making' This would be a great book to find in a game where you could make jewelry.

items.name: Old Book
items.description: There are a few pages missing, but from what you can tell it's a story about a character who goes on an adventure and there is a comic relief sidekick and an old character who is very wise and guides them.

items.name: Used Book
items.description: [insert pop culture reference here]

items.name: Mysterious Map
items.description: You could go looking to see what the X on this map is guiding you to, but this is a game about selling things, so you won't.

items.name: Magic Scroll
items.description: If you could understand the scroll's mysterious language you would know that this scoll teaches a spell which can improve its caster's singing voice.

items.name: Lyre
items.description: Anyway, here's Wonderwall.

items.name: Cute Bag
items.description: This is a cute bag by default because the other bag in the game doesn't look as good.

items.name: Dusty Bag
items.description: You could just brush the dust off this bag, but then you'd have to find a new name for it, and it seems like more trouble than it's worth.

items.name: Lower Case T
items.description: Across from where?

items.name: Carrot
items.description:
Do you really need to read this description? Do you really not know what a carrot is?

(It is a vegetable)

items.name: Fish
items.description: Fish are notoriously good swimmers, not this one though, this one is dead.

items.name: Log
items.description: It's made out of wood.

items.name: Feather
items.description: Most likely came from a bird, or perhaps a very unfortunate human.

items.name: Cool Feather
items.description: Looks cooler than a normal feather, if there were such a thing as a feather collector in this game, they would have paid a lot for this.

items.name: Blocks o' Gold
items.description: In a world where gold is a type of currency, gold is generally considered quite valuable.

items.name: Sugar
items.description: First you get the sugar, then you get the power.

items.name: Crystal
items.description: Maybe it's magical, maybe it's just pretty. In any case it's no use to you and you should sell it.

items.name: Crystal Ball
items.description: In your future I can see you looking back fondly on this game.

items.name: Dying Plant
items.description: It is thirsty little plant, please water it.

items.name: Healthy Plant
items.description: This is not a sentient plant, and if you think you hear it speak it is likely that you are mistaken.

items.name: Golden Sword
items.description: I think this is decorative, I don't think you should use it, but I'm still giving you the option to.

items.name: Holy Bow
items.description: It has been blessed by any deity of your choosing, if you do not choose a deity then it is Jeff Goldblum by default.

items.name: Demonic Bow
items.description: Every time you use this bow, a part of your soul is signed away. You are pretty sure it's not legally enforceable though.

items.name: Humble Staff
items.description: It's the best staff in the game, but it doesn't look very cool, so is it really worth it?

items.name: Fancy Staff
items.description: This staff is enchanted with a curse which makes the user have to do a majestic flourish to cast any spell with it.

items.name: Legendary Sword
items.description: There is a legend about a sword which is really good and the sword in the legend is this sword.

items.name: Hefty Sword
items.description: It is big and heavy and it hurts a lot to get hit by.

items.name: Cool Axe
items.description: If you chopped down a tree with this axe, axe connoisseurs would not take it well.

items.name: Ebony Armour
items.description: It is called Ebony Armour because it is so dark, it is not made of wood, but no one knows what it is made from.

items.name: Samurai Armour
items.description: It protects the wearer from a lot of damage, but this game is not set in Japan, so people might form certain opinions of you if they see you wearing it.

items.name: Nice Dress
items.description: If you enjoy wearing nice dresses, then you may enjoy this dress, which is nice.

items.name: Fancy Jacket
items.description: As you can see from the image and the name, this jacket is fancy. Appropriate for fancy occasions such as classy balls, meetings with royalty, and doing impressions of annoying rich people.

items.name: Plain Dress
items.description: Perhaps it isn't fair to describe this dress as plain, but there are two dresses in the game and this is the plainer of the two.

items.name: Hoodie
items.description: Merchandise for a local band that your player character supports.

items.name: Trendy Scarf
items.description: You are not a high enough level to wear this, and I don't think you ever will be, but it's nice to look at.

items.name: Yellow Bow
items.description: Not bow as in 'bow and arrow', bow as in 'what a pretty yellow bow'.

items.name: Bunny Ears
items.description: This universe doesn't have bunnies, so these are a little confusing to most people, they still look nice though.

items.name: Purple Shield
items.description: Blocks 100% of emotional damage and grants +7 to personality rolls.

items.name: Gold Ring
items.description: When the DLC comes out and your character can get married, you'll wish you'd kept this.

items.name: Silver Ring
items.description: It has a joke printed on the inside, it's really funny and your character laughs when they read it.

items.name: Egg
items.description: Facebook.com/PracticalYolk/
